p: The MIC values of gentamicin, norfloxacin, and SKEO against PAO1 and five MDR strains were investigated. As shown in table 2, SKEO showed dose-dependent antibacterial activity against P. aeruginosa strains. The MIC values of SKEO were in the range of 6 to 12 Âµg/mL and the PAO1 was the most sensitive strain.
